labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: A green circle appears, despite your microphone being muted.
data.expected_result: No green circle should appear around your icon to show that you are speaking.
data.short_description: In group DM voice chat, muted users still show a green circle when their microphone is picking up audio.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a group DM - Start a voice call (preferably with other users) - Mute your mic, or have someone else mute theirs - Speak into the mic
